document.full_text: new york mayor michael bloomberg said on sunday that he hoped the dramatic killing of osama bin laden, mastermind of the september 11, 2001 attacks that brought down the city's twin towers, would comfort those who lost loved ones that day.
document.title: mayor bloomberg hopes bin laden death comforts victims
lines_and_colors: new york mayor michael bloomberg said on sunday that he hoped the dramatic killing of osama bin laden, mastermind of the september 11, 2001 attacks that brought down the city's twin towers, would comfort those who lost loved ones that day.
